dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In the land of Eridoria, where the sun dips into the horizon and paints the sky with hues of crimson and gold...

dialogues.speaker: Eira
dialogues.text: Wait, what's going on? Why are we being summoned to the throne room?

dialogues.speaker: Arin
dialogues.text: I don't know, but I heard rumors of a dark force stirring in the north. Perhaps it's related to that.

dialogues.speaker: King Thrain
dialogues.text: Greetings, brave warriors! I have summoned you here today to discuss a matter of great import. Our scouts have reported strange occurrences in the Darkforest...
